metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel asks Wyll about Mizora and suggests they should just kill her when you find her.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: If you wish to be rid of your devil, Wyll, we should just kill her and be done with it.

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: And incur the wrath of the Hells? I might as well just leap straight into the fires.
